subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Georgie Boy is off the Kentucky Derby trail after pulling a muscle in his back. The trainer Kathy Walsh said the colt would not require surgery. He was scheduled to run in Saturday’s $750,000 Santa Anita Derby, the West Coast’s major prep for the Kentucky Derby on May 3. Georgie Boy is 2-0 as a 3-year-old, winning the San Vicente Stakes on Feb. 10 and the San Felipe Stakes on March 16, both at Santa Anita.
